data.text: @Red_Astronaut @MoMoneyMoSalah I’m not trying to shield or absolve Álisson, or pin the blame on anyone else. I’m stating the obvious: unless the opposition shoot unopposed from midfield on the first second, there’s a sequence of events that leads to goal. I guarantee you Klopp won’t just yell at Álisson.

@P_Lazaridis @MoMoneyMoSalah No. Why are you trying to shield him. He’s a good goalie who made a stupid mistake. He’s human after all. Everybody makes mistakes. What matters is how he reacted afterwards, by not panicking and still trying to find players with a pass. His attitude is top notch.
@P_Lazaridis @MoMoneyMoSalah Van dijk wasn’t at fault,allison had all the time in the world to make a clearance but chose not to

@MoMoneyMoSalah The main thing is that his error can’t be seen in isolation. It followed sloppy play in the midfield and from Van Dijk. In many ways, it was a culmination of poor performances throughout the pitch, throughout the game.
